channel.title: CVE Feed for varunvairavanlc -- LeadConnector
channel.description: The latest CVEs for varunvairavanlc -- LeadConnector

item.title: CVE-2024-1371|2024-08-01T18:40:19.950Z -- varunvairavanlc -- leadconnector
item.description: The LeadConnector plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification & loss of data due to a missing capability check on the lc_public_api_proxy() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.7. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary posts.

item.title: CVE-2024-1371|2024-06-04T18:01:17.517Z -- varunvairavanlc -- leadconnector
item.description: The LeadConnector plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification & loss of data due to a missing capability check on the lc_public_api_proxy() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.7. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary posts.
